| History                 = The World Security Council was a tribunal established by [[Maria Hill (Earth-616)|Maria Hill]] some time during her second tenure as director of [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]],{{r|Captain America: Steve Rogers Vol 1 16}} with the objective to oversee the actions of the leader of the agency, as well as ensure accountability.{{r|Avengers Standoff: Assault On Pleasant Hill Omega Vol 1 1}} Most notably, the World Security Council ousted Maria Hill from her position in S.H.I.E.L.D. following the assault on [[Pleasant Hill]].{{r|Captain America: Steve Rogers Vol 1 10}}
